dialogues.text: Hello there. Would you like to hear about our town's history?
Upon arrival here, a group of six miners found a plethora of rich mineral veins under the hills of this green paradise.
After their first expedition into the mines, some had fallen ill. One of them decided to look for medicinal herbs in the nearby forest.
Unable to find any, he plucked a handful shamrocks and returned. The stew that he made from these shamrocks miraculously cured the miners.
Hence, this town was named after shamrocks and their green colour.
